data.title: 2024 Recognition Dinner
data.text:
PLEASE JOIN US

Thursday, May 9, 2024

5:30 p.m. Cocktails & Hors d’oeuvres

6:15 p.m. Dinner

Marilyn and David Palisin ’64 Commons at St. Edward High School

​

HONOREES:

Mary & Thomas P. Holland ’57

BR. JAMES A. EVERETT, C.S.C. BENEFACTOR AWARD

This prestigious award is presented to an individual or group, honoring transformative support and

steadfast dedication to the mission of St. Edward High School

​

Thomas J. Becks ’77

ALUMNUS OF THE YEAR

The highest honor bestowed upon a St. Edward High School alumnus, this award recognizes exceptional

contributions to our community, alongside a lifelong commitment to upholding the ideals of a Holy Cross

education

​

David L. McNamee ’61

BRONZE EAGLE AWARD

Presented to an esteemed alumnus whose dedication to St. Edward High School not only soars above

but also serves as a beacon for others

​

Paul G. Lange ’75

ST. ANDRÉ BESSETTE, C.S.C. AWARD

Presented to a volunteer whose selfless commitment to St. Edward High School inspires servant

leadership throughout our community

​

Joseph D. Scarpitti

MAUREEN ISABELLA ASHDOWN AWARD

Presented to a non-graduate who exemplifies Holy Cross

hospitality and loyally serves St. Edward High School

Registration is now closed. Click here if you'd like to watch the event live stream on May 9.
